segments.text: When the interview finally comes to an end , the interviewee will probably breathe a sigh of relief .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Still , you should not let down your guard . Some details should be paid attention to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At this moment you can thank the interviewer again for the opportunity of the interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can also ask the interviewer about your performance today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't forget to ask when you can receive a reply .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And it's best to ask about the second interview if necessary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should state politely that you will wait for the results patiently .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can ask questions about the position you are applying for .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In this case , you should remember to give thanks for the reply you get .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just say goodbye to the interviewer before you leave .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Besides , remember to make acknowledgments through an E-mail or a call .
segments.speaker: S2
